refiHoodie.name: üå± ReFi Hoodie
refiHoodie.description: Inspired by regeneration and connection with nature. Made from premium national brushed cotton, providing softness and durability, accompanied by a design that fuses trees, water and tokens. Available in sizes S, M and L, it's a unisex hoodie that represents those who go beyond sustainability.

defiHoodie.name: üîì DeFi Hoodie
defiHoodie.description: Financial freedom also dresses up. This high-quality national brushed cotton hoodie combines style and comfort, with a design that celebrates decentralization and security in Web3. Unisex, available in S, M and L, ideal for those who believe in a financial system without barriers.

governanceHoodie.name: üèõÔ∏è Governance Hoodie
governanceHoodie.description: The voice of the community now also dresses up. Made from premium national brushed cotton, this hoodie is comfortable, resistant and elegant in its retro pixel design about participation and digital voting. Unisex, available in S, M and L, perfect for leaders and dreamers of the decentralized future.

codingHoodie.name: üñ•Ô∏è Code Hoodie
codingHoodie.description: For those who build the future in every line of code. Made from national brushed cotton, soft, warm and durable. Its retro pixel design honors the essence of devs and builders. Available in sizes S, M and L, unisex and perfect to accompany those long innovation sessions.

degenHoodie.name: üåå Degen Hoodie
degenHoodie.description: The hoodie of true degens. Made from the highest quality national brushed cotton, it offers premium comfort and a design that captures the irreverent vibe of the crypto space. Available in sizes S, M and L, it's a unisex hoodie for those who live intensely every movement in Web3.
degenHoodie.shortDescription: Degen hoodie for true crypto rebels

refiCollection.name: üå± ReFi Collection
refiCollection.description: Beyond sustainability, there is regeneration. The ReFi Collection reflects the union between nature and blockchain, with designs that orbit between trees, water and tokens. It is a reminder that Web3 not only transforms economies, it also regenerates territories and communities.

defiCollection.name: üîì DeFi Collection
defiCollection.description: Financial freedom has never looked so good. The DeFi Collection combines security, liquidity and decentralization icons with a retro-futuristic style. Each hoodie transmits the power of a system without intermediaries, where finances are truly in the hands of the community.

governanceCollection.name: üèõÔ∏è Governance Collection
governanceCollection.description: The future is collaborative. The Governance Collection represents collective decision-making and the power of DAOs. Inspired by digital voting, transparency and active participation, this line celebrates true decentralized democracy with a minimalist and impactful style.

codingCollection.name: üñ•Ô∏è Code Collection
codingCollection.description: A tribute to those who build the future line by line. The Code Collection is inspired by the language of programming, with symbols, graphics and details that honor the magic that happens behind every protocol. Ideal for devs, builders and hackers who carry code in their skin.

degenCollection.name: üåå Degen Collection
degenCollection.description: For those who live on the edge of the crypto space. The Degen Collection captures the energy of trading, the adrenaline of market movements and the passion for calculated risk. Bold pixel art designs that reflect the essence of Web3 culture: irreverent, fun and always ready for the next move.
degenCollection.shortDescription: Irreverent and ready for the next move

about.title: About Copoaz√∫ Labs
about.subtitle: Leading the Web3 fashion revolution with innovative blockchain technology and sustainable practices
about.underDevelopment: Our about page is under development. Learn more about Copoaz√∫ Labs and our mission soon!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between traditional fashion and the decentralized future, creating exclusive merchandise that empowers the Web3 community. We believe in democratizing fashion through blockchain technology while maintaining the highest standards of sustainability and quality.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing boundaries with cutting-edge blockchain technology and sustainable fashion practices that set new industry standards.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a global network of Web3 enthusiasts who share our vision of decentralized, inclusive fashion.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to eco-friendly and ethical practices throughout our entire supply chain, from design to delivery.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Open and honest in all our operations, providing full visibility into our processes and impact.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The visionaries behind the Web3 fashion revolution
